lead_paragraph: Dede Oetomo, considered the godfather of Indonesia’s gay rights movement, is fighting a backlash that has turned a long-chilly climate outright hostile.

headline.print_headline: A Happy Warrior in a Faltering Battle for Indonesian Gay Rights
headline.main: A Happy Warrior in a Faltering Battle for Indonesian Gay Rights

snippet: Dede Oetomo, considered the godfather of Indonesia’s gay rights movement, is fighting a backlash that has turned a long-chilly climate outright hostile....
abstract: Saturday Profile of Dede Oetomo, founder of Gaya Nusantara, Indonesia's longest-standing gay rights organization and activist considered to be godfather of country's gay rights movement; Oetomo cheerfully persists in fight despite increased hostility to homosexuality across Indonesia.
